title: Sony: "We have not changed the production number for PlayStation 5 since the start of mass production"

author: CuriousRelation5
text:
Smart move. The stocks fell, so whoever started the rumor could buy, and they'll definitely go up by tomorrow after the event.

This is real life stonks

author: Ockey2020
text: I am so cynical that was my first thought too!!

author: CataclysmZA
text: That's almost entirely what drives the rumour mill these days - stonks.

author: Dallywack3r
text: A two dollar drop doesn’t move markets, you fuckin dunce

author: CataclysmZA
text: Was that an insult? It's not a very good one.

author: Dallywack3r
text: It’s a fact. A 1.3 percent drop in stock price isn’t a discount. It’s an organic daily movement.

author: Dallywack3r
text: Lol it was a two percent dip. It went from $78 to $76.
